markdownRemark.html:
Here’s a running list of all time donations. As I outlined in this post, I would be ‘paying it forward’ by donating 90% of all donations to this blog to other creators that I feel are pushing the creative / maker / independent consultant culture forward.

“If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of giants.” Isaac Newton
